price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߲ ߕߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߌ ߟߊ߫ ߝߋߎ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߌ ߓߊ߯ ߓߎ߬ߦߌ ߘߏ߫ ߟߊߝߎ߲ߘߌ߫ ߒ߬ ߧߋ߫
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفۡجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَنۢبُوعًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lan nu'mina laka ḥattā tafjura lanā mina al-arḍi yanbūʿan
